articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Who are al-Qaeda? | Start Here
articles.description: Why al-Qaeda are still a threat 20 years after 9/11.
articles.content:
Two decades since the September 11 attacks, the world has changed and al-Qaeda have changed.
So who are al-Qaeda today?
And what could the Taliban takeover of Afghanistan mean for them?
